revised_title: The Erian (Devonian) Flora of North-Eastern America: A Comprehensive Study and Revision
tldr: This paper presents a detailed study of the Erian (Devonian) flora of North-Eastern America, including the description of 23 new species and the revision of previously known plants. The author discusses the conditions of growth, relations to the Carboniferous flora, and the introduction and extinction of species in this period.
